member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.Models.RestorePointTypes.CONTINUOUS
member.summary: Continuous restore points describe the earliest possible point-in-times that an Azure SQL database can be restored to. The database can be restored to any point-in-time after the earliest point.
